questions.question: What is the dominant pattern displayed across the fabric's surface?
Describe the primary color scheme utilized in the fabric's design?
What is the overall texture of the fabric, as visibly apparent?
What is the apparent color of the widest stripes in the fabric?
What is the most prominent secondary color among the stripes?
What is the apparent width of the individual stripes, relative to each other?
What kind of visual effect is created by the diagonal lines within some stripes?
What subtle color accents the edges of certain stripes?
What is the visible direction of the fabric's weave?
What is the apparent type of stitching or binding present?
How would you describe the visual weight of the fabric's pattern?
What is the visual density of the color within the fabric?
What kind of visual impact do the thinner stripes create?
What is the main method of adding visual interest to the fabric?
Is the fabric visibly showing any kind of sheen or luster?
